title: Bank Account Management
description: Spring Boot microservices for a complete bank account system, covering customer and account management, using MySQL database.

title: Result Management System
description: A result management system with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js following the MVC model, implemented user authentication.

title: Covileer
description: Covileer is a web based application which provides the volunteer services related to delivery to Covid affected/quarantined people, and needy people.
